```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
filename_vtrack_prod = "./sdk-api-calls/prod-vtrackserver3.csv"
vtrack_prod <- 
  read_csv(filename_vtrack_prod)
vtrack_prod
```

```{r}
vtrack_prod %>%
  filter(app_id > 0, na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(unity = 1) %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "platform",
    values_from = "unity",
    values_fill = 0
  ) %>%
  select(-c("NA")) %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "app_id",
    names_prefix = "app_id_",
    values_from = "count",
    values_fill = 0
  ) %>%
  arrange(path)
```
